title: ghost poro [RUNE]
body:
when you enter a  bush , a poro is summoned 
if  an enemy comes to the bush they will scare it away..
ok so?

replies.body: Yeah but poro is on a 30 second cooldown and you get wards on top of having the poro.

I don't know how this works exactly, but it sounds decent. I assume it's a lesser rune, not one of the top tier ones. But free wards whenever you enter a bush (I assume with a cooldown) sounds pretty nice.
